column4: Anyone in for real fun with Vista speech recognition? Go here: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KyLqUf4cdwc&mode=related&search=
it's just the usual level of quality Microsoft gives...
yes so much work to do something simple
i'm still watching and laughing harder
there's a whole bunch of videos just as hilarious...keep looking!
I keep laughing because all the guys who try it get mad...at it...LOL!
it seems pretty real. as in everybody gets mad
i love when it types random words
press n  "backspace" press n "backspace" press n "backspace"
